short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View how inflation is affecting currency in real-time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Adjust Inflation extension dynamically updates the sites you browse with adjusted-for-inflation currency values.

* See in real-time how much inflation has degraded a number of countries currencies.
* Play with the calculator, to see how your expenses such as bills, property valuations and salary has been affected by inflation
* Compare between different markets with the interactive chart
* Highlight & Overlay the Adjusted values in the pages you visit
